SEARCH

Package com.dhk.io

package com.dhk.io
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConnectedDisplaysPoller
    This class starts a display configuration updater on a new thread.
    DisplayConfig
    This class gets the current information for the connected displays.
    DisplayConfigUpdater
    This class provides methods to detect if there was a display configuration change, and if there was, then the settings manager, model, view, and controllers will be re-initialized to reflect the new display configuration.
    EnumDisplayIds
    This class utilizes the EnumDisplayIds JNI library to retreive the current array of display IDs.
    EnumDisplayModes
    This class utilizes the EnumDisplayModes JNI library to retreive the current array of supported display modes for a given display.
    KeyText
    This class gets the text representation for a given key code.
    RunOnStartupManager
    This class gets the application's path and uses it to create or destroy a batch file that will run the application on Windows login.
    SetDisplay
    This class utilizes the SetDisplay JNI library to immediately apply the given display mode, scaling mode, and DPI scale percentage for the given display.
    SettingsManager
    This class saves the application settings in an ini file.
    SettingsValidator
    This class validates all of the property values in the settings file.
